title: I Dream
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 34 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: What do you dream about? Are your dreams exciting, funny, or scary? I Dream takes students on an exciting journey through a boy's dreams. This book can also be used to teach students how to identify characters and settings as wells as the proper use of periods. Repetitive sentences, high frequency words, and colorful illustrations support early emergent readers.
meta: dream, monsters, robots, space, sports, super powers
Connect to prior knowledge to better understand text
Identify Characters and Setting : Identify characters and setting in a story
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words about and I

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
